name: Sceal - The Story Of Ireland
description:
This is my entry to the "Historically Accurate Game Jam 5" game jam.
(January 1st-8th 2022)

https://itch.io/jam/historically-accurate-5

The game takes you on a journey through the entire history of the island of Ireland.

Install  - Windows
==================
Download and extract the zip file to any folder.
Run Sceal.exe

Install  - Linux
==================
Download and extract the zip file to any folder.
Run Sceal

Install  - MacOS
==================
Download and extract the zip file to any folder.
Run Sceal

Controls:

The game is controlled using the mouse.
Use left mouse click to activate all buttons, tiles, events etc
Use right mouse click to cancel an action.

Gameplay:
There are 7 Eras to play through.
Each era has 5 real events and one bogus event.
The events are made up of 4 tiles which need to be moved together to form the complete event.

One the event has been created it can be placed on the map of Ireland.
Beware the wolves and closed eyes!

I hope you enjoy playing this game!
